Re Master Swap UpdateI never heard back about the status of the last swap update I did Any information on the status of the problems Forwarded by Brenda WhiteheadHOUECT on PM Peggy Hedstrom PM To Brenda CT cc Subject Re Master Swap Update Do you have an updated listing of Master Swaps that you can forward to us Thanks Peggy Brenda Whitehead PM To Phillip K CT Alan CT Harry CT Michael C CT Donald M ECT Origination CT David J CT Bob CT Nella CT Janet R CT Mark CT Amita CT Barbara N CT Mark E CT Julia CT Gary CT James E ES Kyle CT Matthias CT Drew C CT Jonathon McKayCALECT Tammy L CT Edward CT Beth CT Angeline CT Dianne CT Kevin CT Greg CT Peggy CT Connie CT cc Subject Master Swap Update see this attachment

Re OUT OF THE OFFICE Cc already assigned to a desk for the week Taffy Milligan PM To Mark CT Ann Elizabeth CT Tana CT Susan CT Kathleen nron cc Kaye CT Brenda CT Janette CT Subject OUT OF THE OFFICE I will need to leave at pm on Wed and Thurs this week I have a Dr appt at on Friday am I should be in by noon Brenda Can Gloria sit at my desk Friday morning I dont think a clerk will be adequate coverage Theres a good chance Ann Elizabeth will have some word processing work to be done Taffy

TVA Control Area LawsuitWORK PRODUCT NOT DISCOVERABLE EPMI filed an amended petition with the court in Tennessee where EPMIs current declaratory judgment action interface issue is pending alleging that TVA violated NERC rules as a result of TVAs actions during the summer of In order to amend the current petition to include this additional claim EPMI needs the courts approval Please call me if you have any questions Elizabeth Sager

TVA Termination of MOPA and Related Dec ActionWORK PRODUCT NOT DISCOVERABLE Pursuant to a letter faxed to TVA today January th we notified TVA that EPMI was terminating the MOPA effective February earliest date permitted under the MOPA At the same time we filed an amended petition with the court in Tennessee where EPMIs current claim against TVA interface issue is pending seeking a declaratory judgment that EPMI had the right to terminate the MOPA In order to include this additional claim in the already filed petition we will need the approval of the court Copies of the letter will be distributed later Elizabeth Sager

Merrill Lynch Capitalare revised documents Below is a summary of changes made Copies enclosed are clean copies Please carefully review all documents so that we can next move to final execution copies Thanks for everybodys help Revised Physical Confirm Changes Made SETOFF Paragraph B First sentence deleted and the phrase of the Master Agreement added after the reference to Section Definition of Business Day changed commas to parenthesis Definition of Year added Exhibit D numbers added and the name of the Exhibit was changed to Option Premium The phrase as amended added in the first paragraph with respect to the definition of the Master Agreement Definition of Summer Season amended to delete NERC definition because NERC is already defined Exhibit C a First sentence modified to reflect the fact that the Daily Energy Charge calculation will vary depending upon whether a given Month is in the Summer Season or the NonSummer Season and b the phrase where or and where was added three times immediately prior to each set of definitions Revised Financial Confirm Added the words shall be in last paragraph of Section Energy Quantity Deleted proviso in Section Cash Settlement Amount for each Energy Index Point Added phrase in b of Section Billing and Payment to show that payments could go to Seller from Buyer and in c to add words as amended Added Exhibit IIIOption Premium Schedule to ISDA Changes Made Added ENA as specified entity ML Part a Fixed names in Part k from ML and Enron to Credit Support Provider Add notice for ML Part a Reference amendment to Guaranty Part f

Merrill Lynch Capital Alternate Deal Structureare those documents I believe would be impacted if we elect to use separate Credit Support Annexes one for the new EPMI ISDA and one for the Power Master already in existence Old CSA New Credit Support Annex to be attached to EPMIML ISDA New CSA Draft enclosed including one marked to show changes from CSA currently in place between ENA and ML Schedule to ISDA Part F would reflect New CSA rather than Old CSA Revised Schedule attached No Amendment to Power Agreement would be required Delete document named Power Amendment blackline version

Merrill Lynch Capital Execution Documentswe discussed enclosed are execution copies of the documents that we have been working on Please review and if acceptable have an authorized officer of ML execute each of the enclosed documents and return to my attention at fax no We will follow up with hard copies Thanks for all your help Elizabeth

a result of feedback from employee surveys and a desire to create informal opportunities for QA and discussions around our business every weeks EWS Executives will be hosting a floor talk and QA session Please join Mark Frevert Chairman CEO Enron Wholesale Services on Friday th December am on the th floor EB Format This Was The Month That Was The Month ahead QA Please think of any questions you would like to ask Mark during the QA session If you would prefer to presubmit your question please send to Nicki Daw via email
Power Group Calendarprovide me with information regarding time out of the office for the month of January at your earliest convenience Thanks

ISDA Energy Conference Cc Elizabeth Sagers requests attached are her revisions to your agenda Forwarded by Brenda WhiteheadHOUECT on PM Elizabeth Sager PM To Brenda CT cc Subject ISDA Energy Conference Forwarded by Elizabeth SagerHOUECT on PM Liz OSullivan PM To cc Subject ISDA Energy Conference Elizabeth ISDA is holding an Energy conference on March th at The Four Seasons Hotel in Houston We would be delighted to have you speak again on the same issues you discussed at our North American Energy and Developing Products Committee meeting last October at The Regency Hyatt Please find attached a DRAFT agenda for the morning discussion for your information I am in the process of finalizing the agenda and would appreciate advice on selecting bullet points to describe briefly the discussion on the Comparison of Master Agreements used in North America and Europe I have allowed minutes for the discussion PM PM In addition we would welcome any suggestions you may have on inviting an ISDA member from a another company to help you discuss topic elizabeth sagerdoc I will call you soon to discuss Thanks and regards Liz Ms Liz OSullivan International Swaps and Derivatives Association Inc Fifth Avenue th Floor Rockefeller Center New York NY elizabeth sagerdoc

CLE Seminarsare the sites Mary had record of Forwarded by Brenda WhiteheadHOUECT on AM Mary J Heinitz AM To Brenda CT cc Subject CLE Seminars Forwarded by Mary J HeinitzHOUECT on AM Becky Tlucek AM To Alan CT Roger CT Peggy CT Sandi M CT Teresa G CT Michelle CT Harry M CT Shonnie CT Peter del CT Stacy E CT Shawna CT Chris CT Barbara N CT Wayne CT Mark E CT Leslie CT Dan J CT Anne C CT Dan CT Travis CT Lisa CT Janet H CT Janice R CT Julia CT Gerald CT David CT Michael A CT Elizabeth CT Richard B CT Lance Schuler CT Sara CT Shari CT Carol St CT Lou CT Mark CT Sheila CT Steve Van CT Ann Elizabeth CT Stuart CT Barton CT Bob CT Jeffrey T CT Martin W nron Jason nron James NRON Kay nron John nron cc Joya CT Chaundra CT Kaye CT Pat CT Sheri L CT Twanda CT Brenda CT Jenny ct Linda J CT Linda J CT Dina nron Erica CT Janette CT Carolyn NRON Suzanne CT Taffy CT bcc Mary J HeinitzHOUECT Subject CLE Seminars I am sure youall have all the CLE you probably need but just in case you do not there is an easy way to catch up You can earn CLE credits through several websites on the internet The advantage of this is that all you need is a computer with an internet connection You can attend when you want hours a day from your home or the office Some will allow you to log your time which enables you to break away from the seminar to finish at a later time There is a fee in most cases You can register online or by phone and can charge it to your credit card with either registration method The websites I know about are listed below There are probably more if you do an internet search for CLE cleclenow httpwwwcleonlinecom The first two listed are on the Texas Bar and American Bar Associations websites
emails sent by Rogers Herndon are encrypted and cannot be opened
this will get to you Ive already faxed the document to you also

ISDA Energy Conference Cc Elizabeth Sagers requests attached are her revisions to your agenda Forwarded by Brenda WhiteheadHOUECT on PM Elizabeth Sager PM To Brenda CT cc Subject ISDA Energy Conference Forwarded by Elizabeth SagerHOUECT on PM Liz OSullivan PM To cc Subject ISDA Energy Conference Elizabeth ISDA is holding an Energy conference on March th at The Four Seasons Hotel in Houston We would be delighted to have you speak again on the same issues you discussed at our North American Energy and Developing Products Committee meeting last October at The Regency Hyatt Please find attached a DRAFT agenda for the morning discussion for your information I am in the process of finalizing the agenda and would appreciate advice on selecting bullet points to describe briefly the discussion on the Comparison of Master Agreements used in North America and Europe I have allowed minutes for the discussion PM PM In addition we would welcome any suggestions you may have on inviting an ISDA member from a another company to help you discuss topic elizabeth sagerdoc I will call you soon to discuss Thanks and regards Liz Ms Liz OSullivan International Swaps and Derivatives Association Inc Fifth Avenue th Floor Rockefeller Center New York NY elizabeth sagerdoc
